entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -41.9°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
